com.defano.jmonet.tools.base

Interface TransformToolDelegate

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PerspectiveTool, ProjectionTool, RubberSheetTool, ScaleTool, SlantTool

    public interface TransformToolDelegate
    A delegate responsible for handling changes made to the transformed selection frame.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void moveBottomLeft(FlexQuadrilateral quadrilateral, Point newPosition, boolean isShiftDown)
      Invoked to indicate that the user has dragged/moved the bottom-left handle of the transform quadrilateral to a new position.
      void moveBottomRight(FlexQuadrilateral quadrilateral, Point newPosition, boolean isShiftDown)
      Invoked to indicate that the user has dragged/moved the bottom-right handle of the transform quadrilateral to a new position.
      void moveTopLeft(FlexQuadrilateral quadrilateral, Point newPosition, boolean isShiftDown)
      Invoked to indicate that the user has dragged/moved the top-left handle of the transform quadrilateral to a new position.
      void moveTopRight(FlexQuadrilateral quadrilateral, Point newPosition, boolean isShiftDown)
      Invoked to indicate that the user has dragged/moved the top-right handle of the transform quadrilateral to a new position.

    • Method Detail

      • moveTopLeft

        void moveTopLeft(FlexQuadrilateral quadrilateral,
                 Point newPosition,
                 boolean isShiftDown)
        Invoked to indicate that the user has dragged/moved the top-left handle of the transform quadrilateral to a new position. Transforms the selection frame and bounded pixels accordingly.
        Parameters:
        quadrilateral - The quadrilateral representing the transform bounds.
        newPosition - The new location of the affected drag handle.
        isShiftDown - True to indicate user is holding shift down; implementers may optionally use this flag to constrain drag movement or apply some other feature of the transform.

      • moveTopRight

        void moveTopRight(FlexQuadrilateral quadrilateral,
                  Point newPosition,
                  boolean isShiftDown)
        Invoked to indicate that the user has dragged/moved the top-right handle of the transform quadrilateral to a new position. Transforms the selection frame and bounded pixels accordingly.
        Parameters:
        quadrilateral - The quadrilateral representing the transform bounds.
        newPosition - The new location of the affected drag handle.
        isShiftDown - True to indicate user is holding shift down; implementers may optionally use this flag to constrain drag movement or apply some other feature of the transform.

      • moveBottomLeft

        void moveBottomLeft(FlexQuadrilateral quadrilateral,
                    Point newPosition,
                    boolean isShiftDown)
        Invoked to indicate that the user has dragged/moved the bottom-left handle of the transform quadrilateral to a new position. Transforms the selection frame and bounded pixels accordingly.
        Parameters:
        quadrilateral - The quadrilateral representing the transform bounds.
        newPosition - The new location of the affected drag handle.
        isShiftDown - True to indicate user is holding shift down; implementers may optionally use this flag to constrain drag movement or apply some other feature of the transform.

      • moveBottomRight

        void moveBottomRight(FlexQuadrilateral quadrilateral,
                     Point newPosition,
                     boolean isShiftDown)
        Invoked to indicate that the user has dragged/moved the bottom-right handle of the transform quadrilateral to a new position. Transforms the selection frame and bounded pixels accordingly.
        Parameters:
        quadrilateral - The quadrilateral representing the transform bounds.
        newPosition - The new location of the affected drag handle.
        isShiftDown - True to indicate user is holding shift down; implementers may optionally use this flag to constrain drag movement or apply some other feature of the transform.
